Entry.JapaneseText: ……ヒューマの身体って…… ガジュマとはどう違うの……？
Entry.EnglishText: ...So how is a Huma's body different from a Gajuma's...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……見た目や、肌触りは違いますけど、 感覚はあまり変わらない気がします……
Entry.EnglishText: The appearance and feel are different, but I don't feel as though any of my senses have changed...

Entry.JapaneseText: ただ、大きく違うのは…… 尻尾と耳かしら……
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps the biggest differences are the tail and the ears...

Entry.JapaneseText: つい、動かそうとしてしまうんですけど、 尻尾はないし、耳は動かなくて……
Entry.EnglishText: Sometimes, I feel like I want to move them, but I have no tail, and these ears don't move...

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん……意外なところで、 種族の違いが出るものね……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... So it looks as though the differences between races show up in unexpected places...
